title: Tupiniquim Brazil Crepes - Kiosk
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Juice bar, Take-out, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Kiosk making traditional Brazilian food and offers a large drinks menu of smoothies and juices; has almond milk. Gluten free flour is used to make the crepes, and you could ask for vegan batter. Uses compostable serving ware. It's near The Meadows and opposite the Bank of Scotland.
